title: Object - StockPlan
description: Object describing a plan which stock options are issued from

board_approval_date.description: Date which board approved the plan

current_shares_reserved.description: The number of shares currently approved. The original number of shares can be determined from the event log

stock_class_id.description: Id of the StockClass object this plan is composed of

comments.description: Unstructured text comments related to and stored for the object
